post:
# **Fastmako.com**

Fastmako wants to make entry in the low end market. This is the very first advertisement of our special offers within LET community. We want to take it in baby steps, to be sure this does not become some kind of summer host. We thank you beforehand for your trust, and we respect every customer, even if they decide to order or not.

**Here are some of our offers:**
(All offers are using **KVM** in **Netherlands**)

#### _METERED OFFERS:_

#### ROOT 1N
1 CPU Core
1 GB RAM
20 GB SSD Disk
1 TB Traffic
250 Mbps Bandwidth
€2.5/mo
order link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

#### ROOT 2N
1 CPU Core
2 GB RAM
40 GB SSD Disk
2 TB Traffic
250 Mbps Bandwidth
€5/mo
order link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2

_MORE SUCH OFFERS: https://fastmako.com/pricing/_

#### _UNMETERED OFFER:_
_*(with connection speed limited to 50Mbps if more than 30 TB/month are used in a month)_

#### UNMETERED 1N
1 CPU Core
1 GB RAM
20 GB SSD Disk
UNMETERED Traffic*
250 Mbps Bandwidth
€5/mo
order link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9


_MORE SUCH OFFERS: https://fastmako.com/pricing/_

#### _**Looking glass: http://eu-nl.fastmako.com/**_
